text: - Lambda Development is the leading
real estate company in Greece,
investing, management, and operating
shopping malls, mega yachts marinas,
office, and residential areas.
Nowadays, our flagship project

is the redevelopment of the
former Ellinikon airport
into a new state-of-the-art city.

It is the biggest urban
development in Europe.
In the past, we were really containerized

on solutions that we
couldn't expand too much
and wouldn't scale too much.
We were an on-premise organization
that were shifting into cloud
and into software as a service solutions.
Of course, we see

the opportunities that
we have with technology
and how these can help us to tackle
some pretty specific business requirements
that previously we couldn't reach.
With using cloud services nowadays,
we have the scalability and expandability

of the solutions offered
to our organization.

We chose AWS for their
technological advancements

and due to this big ecosystem
of partners that they have,

that they were willing to
experiment and work with us
on custom-specific projects we had.
Working with cloud services
and pay-as-you-go scenarios,

help us on small scale
projects that we may run
to have competitive advantages
and not invest too much initially.
As a company, we try to be the best
in the real estate market in Greece,
and of course, we're targeting perfection.
AWS help us to fulfill our mission

to be a trusted business
partner for the organization.
(thoughtful music)
